Package index

All functions

avg_rank()
Compute the Average Rank of All Items
bootstrap_list()
Bootstrap the Data Frames in a List
identity
Identity-ranking data analyzed in Atsusaka and Kim (2024)
identity_w
Identity-ranking data with estimated weights based on inverse probability weighting
imprr_direct()
Bias-correct the Distribution of Ranking Permutations Using a Paired Anchor Question and Produce De-biased Average Rankings
imprr_weights()
Bias-correct the Distribution of Ranking Permutations (IPW Estimator Version)
item_to_rank()
Return Rankings with Items as Columns
ordinal_seq()
Generate an Ordinal Sequence from a Number
permn_augment()
Augmenting Permutation Patterns
plot_dist_ranking()
Plot the Distribution of Rankings Over the Permutation Space
rank_longer()
Turn Column(s) Recording Rankings in Wide Format into a Long Data Format
recover_recorded_responses()
Recover the Recorded Responses Given that Ranking Items were Randomized
rpluce()
Draw Samples from the Plackett-Luce Model
sim_rank()
Simulate the Probability that a Given Ranking Permutation Pattern is Chosen Over a Random Effect Variable
sim_rank_randeff()
Simulate the Probability that a Given Ranking Permutation Pattern is Chosen Over a Random Effect Variable
stratified_avg()
Stratified Estimate of Average Ranks
table_to_tibble()
Turn the Frequency Table into a Tibble or Data Frame
unbiased_correct_prop()
Unbiased Estimator of the Proportion of Random and Non-random Responses
viz_avg_rank()
Visualize Average Rankings
viz_ranking()
Visualize Quantities of Interest Using Ranking Data
weight_patterns()
Extract Weights of Ranking Permutation Patterns Using a Paired Anchor Question
